actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act authorizing Federal participation in the cost of protecting the shores of publicly owned property," approved August 13, 1946, as amended, to raise the limitation from $1 to $2 million.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to undertake construction of small shore and beach restoration and protection projects provided that not more than $2,000,000 is allotted to any project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act authorizing Federal participation in the cost of protecting the shores of publicly owned property," approved August 13, 1946, as amended, to raise the limitation from $1 to $2 million.
